post.author: Admin
post.title: SpeedBlazing 2
post.description: Very happy to announce the release of a mobile game on #ios and #android !
post.content:
Very happy to announce the release of a mobile game on #ios and #android !

🚀 SpeedBlazing 2 🚀

Developped with Unity, it is a concrete opportunity to use Bezier curves or Gauss curves in an actual project.

Wartning : this is a deep dive in the 80's, so beware your eyes 😨 and it's dificult to handle 😡 (like in good old days) :

ios : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6450916348?ct=Tap33582888

Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DefaultCompany.SpeedBlazing2&pli=1

More info here : https://www.speedblazing2.com/
